sentences.english: May God bless the grieving families, and may God continue to bless America.
sentences.chinese: 愿神保佑他们悲恸的家人，愿神继续保佑美国。

sentences.english: But though slightly drunk he was also suffering under some grief that was genuine and unbearable .
sentences.chinese: 不过他纵然略有醉意，却有着什么真切难忍的悲恸。

sentences.english: And through the dream the future wept, grieving for the lost tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 梦中的未来悲恸哀泣，追悼失落的明天。

sentences.english: The imagined grief was so poignant that Bertha burst into tears.
sentences.chinese: 想象的悲恸是如此强烈，使伯莎泪如泉涌。

sentences.english: My voice cracked and my eyes filled with tears.
sentences.chinese: 声音悲恸，眼中满是泪水。

sentences.english: He first went home and sadly found that his mother passed away already.
sentences.chinese: 回到家乡，发现母亲已经去逝，悲恸不已。

sentences.english: He came closer and noted tears of grief and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 他走近之后才注意到，他们竟流下了悲恸的眼泪。

sentences.english: It is especially poignant that he died on the day before his wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他在婚礼前一天去世了，这尤其令人悲恸。

sentences.english: Grieved to report(that) your son died a heroic death in the cause of revolution.
sentences.chinese: 我们悲恸地通知您，您的儿子为革命事业英勇牺牲了。

sentences.english: Which makes the maid weep like the dewy night.
sentences.chinese: 这侍女便为之悲恸，泪珠如夜露涔涔。

sentences.english: With anguish he wished he could do something for walter .
sentences.chinese: 悲恸之余，他希望能为沃尔特做点事。

sentences.english: When his only child died, Sam might have given way to grief.
sentences.chinese: 山姆唯一的孩子死去时，他悲恸不已。

sentences.english: His grief is that his mother should feed on him, himself and what he saw.
sentences.chinese: 他的悲恸是子果母腹，是他自身加上他所见。

sentences.english: Her heart was riven with deep sorrow.
Similar laments have been heard around China this summer.
sentences.chinese: 今夏，相似的悲恸也萦绕着中国。
